profile: We are here to help you bring your vision to life! We started this company because we felt that although there are many contractors out there, it is really hard to find ones that deliver on time, on budget, and at the same time while ensuring no damage to your property. We also pride ourselves on being friendly and blessed with good communications skills. We will work with you to design your room or home of your dream. We will provide you with a detailed estimate with a breakdown to help you understand the main drivers behind the cost. We have the testimonials of many customers to back this and we would love to chat with you about your next project. Call Eddie, our lead, now for a free, no-obligation estimate and see for yourself what service you have been missing.

profile:
Bath Makeover: A division of Your Plumber, specializes in stylish, cost-effective, low-maintenance bathroom improvements. 

Quality Renovations - We Don't Do Cover-Ups! 

In every renovation we do, we fully remove your existing bathtub or shower. We also remove your bathtub surround so we can check for mould and mildew growth on the drywall and surrounding area. 

We carefully evaluate the condition of the drainage system, surrounding plumbing and structural conditions. We repair any issues we come across. We don't want to cover up something potentially dangerous. 

Bath Makeover offers a wide selection of solutions for your bathroom renovation needs including: replacement bathtubs, acrylic bath & shower systems, quality fixtures, vanities & cabinetry, and more. 

We also offer accessibility options such as tub to shower conversions, walk in bathtubs and barrier free showers. We can even convert your existing bathtub into a walk in shower.

Service Provided
We are bathroom renovation specialists. 
- One day bathroom makeovers 
- Full service renovations 
- Free in home consultations 
- Huge selection of products, materials & finishes 
- Trusted partners / licensed and insured 
- 24 Hour emergency plumbing services
